title: "password required after device restarts" Issue on Google Pixel 2 XL
content:
I suddenly got locked out of the phone today. I was normally using it to take some pictures and next after few minutes when I checked I saw that it is locked with a weird message that read "password required after device restarts".
I have tried using my pin, my google password and any other password that I could recall and nothing has worked. My device location is not active so I cannot use find my device to unlock it.
I think I updated the device like in last 2-3 days to a newer version.
I cannot access my phone and everytime I put a new pin/password, it shows me that "password required after device restarts" error.

Please help Google. There has to be a fix of this stupid error of yours other than just wanting us to factory reset the phone.

please help.
